name: [Hong Kong Taste Adventure] Chapter 2 - HK Style Dessert
description:
If you have tried Hong Kong "Yum Cha",dim sum, 
then you shouldn't miss Hong Kong style dessert
---Tong Sui!

Hong Kong is one of the rare cities that is even livelier and more interesting at night than it is during the day;let's do as most Hong Kong people do: have some traditional HK dessert then off to bed.

Hong Kong is a GOURMET city, really.
And I just want you to experience all these.
